AddCdnDomain.title: AddCdnDomain
AddCdnDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to accelerate.

BatchAddCdnDomain.title: BatchAddCdnDomain
BatchAddCdnDomain.summary: Adds one or more domain names to Alibaba Cloud CDN. You can add a maximum of 50 domain names at a time.

BatchDeleteCdnDomainConfig.title: BatchDeleteCdnDomainConfig
BatchDeleteCdnDomainConfig.summary: Deletes configurations of multiple accelerated domain names at a time.

BatchDescribeCdnIpInfo.title: BatchDescribeCdnIpInfo
BatchDescribeCdnIpInfo.summary: Queries whether one or more IP addresses are assigned to Alibaba Cloud CDN.

BatchSetCdnDomainConfig.title: BatchSetCdnDomainConfig
BatchSetCdnDomainConfig.summary: Configures multiple accelerated domain names at a time.

BatchStartCdnDomain.title: BatchStartCdnDomain
BatchStartCdnDomain.summary: Enables one or more domain names at a time. After a domain name is enabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter is changed to Online.

BatchStopCdnDomain.title: BatchStopCdnDomain
BatchStopCdnDomain.summary: Disables one or more accelerated domain names at a time. After an accelerated domain name is disabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter is changed to Offline.

BatchUpdateCdnDomain.title: BatchUpdateCdnDomain
BatchUpdateCdnDomain.summary: Updates the configurations of multiple accelerated domain names at a time.

CheckCdnDomainExist.title: CheckCdnDomainExist
CheckCdnDomainExist.summary: Checks whether a domain name exists.

CheckCdnDomainICP.title: CheckCdnDomainICP
CheckCdnDomainICP.summary: Checks whether an ICP filing is obtained for the domain name.

CreateCdnDeliverTask.title: CreateCdnDeliverTask
CreateCdnDeliverTask.summary: Creates a tracking task. After you create a tracking task, the system sends operations reports to you by email on a regular basis.

CreateRealTimeLogDelivery.title: CreateRealTimeLogDelivery
CreateRealTimeLogDelivery.summary: Enables real-time log delivery for specific accelerated domain names.

CreateUsageDetailDataExportTask.title: CreateUsageDetailDataExportTask
CreateUsageDetailDataExportTask.summary: Creates a task to export resource usage details to an Excel file.

CreateUserUsageDataExportTask.title: CreateUserUsageDataExportTask
CreateUserUsageDataExportTask.summary: Creates a task to export your resource usage history to a PDF file.

DeleteCdnDeliverTask.title: DeleteCdnDeliverTask
DeleteCdnDeliverTask.summary: Deletes tracking tasks by task ID.

DeleteCdnDomain.title: DeleteCdnDomain
DeleteCdnDomain.summary: Removes an accelerated domain name from Alibaba Cloud CDN.

DeleteFCTrigger.title: DeleteFCTrigger
DeleteFCTrigger.summary: Deletes a specified Function Compute trigger.

DeleteRealTimeLogLogstore.title: DeleteRealTimeLogLogstore
DeleteRealTimeLogLogstore.summary: Deletes the Logstore that is used by a specified configuration record of real-time log delivery.

DeleteRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DeleteRealtimeLogDelivery
DeleteRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Deletes the configurations of real-time log delivery for specific accelerated domain names.

DeleteSpecificConfig.title: DeleteSpecificConfig
DeleteSpecificConfig.summary: Deletes specified configurations of an accelerated domain name.

DeleteSpecificStagingConfig.title: DeleteSpecificStagingConfig
DeleteSpecificStagingConfig.summary: Deletes a specified configuration of the staging environment.

DeleteUsageDetailDataExportTask.title: DeleteUsageDetailDataExportTask
DeleteUsageDetailDataExportTask.summary: Deletes a task that was used to export usage details.

DeleteUserUsageDataExportTask.title: DeleteUserUsageDataExportTask
DeleteUserUsageDataExportTask.summary: Deletes a task that was used to export usage history.

DescribeBlockedRegions.title: DescribeBlockedRegions
DescribeBlockedRegions.summary: Queries countries and regions that can be added to the blacklist.

DescribeCdnCertificateDetail.title: DescribeCdnCertificateDetail
DescribeCdnCertificateDetail.summary: Queries the detailed information about an SSL certificate.

DescribeCdnCertificateDetailById.title: DescribeCdnCertificateDetailById
DescribeCdnCertificateDetailById.summary: Queries certificate details by certificate ID.

DescribeCdnCertificateList.title: DescribeCdnCertificateList
DescribeCdnCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificates of accelerated domain names.

DescribeCdnConditionIPBInfo.title: DescribeCdnConditionIPBInfo
DescribeCdnConditionIPBInfo.summary: Queries the Internet service provider (ISP), region, and country that are required for advanced conditions.

DescribeCdnDeletedDomains.title: DescribeCdnDeletedDomains
DescribeCdnDeletedDomains.summary: Queries the domain names that are deleted from your account.

DescribeCdnDeliverList.title: DescribeCdnDeliverList
DescribeCdnDeliverList.summary: Queries one or more tracking tasks of operations reports.

DescribeCdnDomainByCertificate.title: DescribeCdnDomainByCertificate
DescribeCdnDomainByCertificate.summary: Queries accelerated domain names by SSL certificate.

DescribeCdnDomainConfigs.title: DescribeCdnDomainConfigs
DescribeCdnDomainConfigs.summary: Queries the configurations of an accelerated domain name. You can query the configurations of one or more features at the same time.

DescribeCdnDomainDetail.title: DescribeCdnDomainDetail
DescribeCdnDomainDetail.summary: Queries the basic information about an accelerated domain name.

DescribeCdnDomainLogs.title: DescribeCdnDomainLogs
DescribeCdnDomainLogs.summary: Queries the address where you can download the log data of a specific domain name.

DescribeCdnDomainStagingConfig.title: DescribeCdnDomainStagingConfig
DescribeCdnDomainStagingConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of features in the staging environment.

DescribeCdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig.title: DescribeCdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig
DescribeCdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig.summary: You can call the DescribeCdnFullDomainsBlockIPConfig operation to query the configurations of full blocking.

DescribeCdnHttpsDomainList.title: DescribeCdnHttpsDomainList
DescribeCdnHttpsDomainList.summary: Queries the information about SSL certificates that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeCdnOrderCommodityCode.title: DescribeCdnOrderCommodityCode
DescribeCdnOrderCommodityCode.summary: Queries the code of a commodity by account UID.

DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp.title: DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp
DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp.summary: Queries Internet service providers (ISPs) and regions that are supported by Alibaba Cloud CDN.

DescribeCdnReport.title: DescribeCdnReport
DescribeCdnReport.summary: Queries the content of an operations report.

DescribeCdnSMCertificateDetail.title: DescribeCdnSMCertificateDetail
DescribeCdnSMCertificateDetail.summary: Queries the details about a ShangMi (SM) certificate.

DescribeCdnSMCertificateList.title: DescribeCdnSMCertificateList
DescribeCdnSMCertificateList.summary: Queries the ShangMi (SM) certificates of an accelerated domain name.

DescribeCdnSSLCertificateList.title: DescribeCdnSSLCertificateList
DescribeCdnSSLCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificate list by domain name.

DescribeCdnSecFuncInfo.title: DescribeCdnSecFuncInfo
DescribeCdnSecFuncInfo.summary: Queries information about security features of Alibaba Cloud CDN.

DescribeCdnService.title: DescribeCdnService
DescribeCdnService.summary: Queries the status of your Alibaba Cloud CDN service. The information includes the service activation time, the current service status, the current metering method, and the metering method for the next cycle.

DescribeCdnSubList.title: DescribeCdnSubList
DescribeCdnSubList.summary: Queries the tracking tasks that you have created.

DescribeCdnTypes.title: DescribeCdnTypes
DescribeCdnTypes.summary: Queries the types of domain names.

DescribeCdnUserBillHistory.title: DescribeCdnUserBillHistory
DescribeCdnUserBillHistory.summary: Queries the billing history under your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeCdnUserBillPrediction.title: DescribeCdnUserBillPrediction
DescribeCdnUserBillPrediction.summary: Estimates resource usage of the current month.

DescribeCdnUserBillType.title: DescribeCdnUserBillType
DescribeCdnUserBillType.summary: Queries information about the metering methods of an account. The maximum time range to query is one month.

DescribeCdnUserDomainsByFunc.title: DescribeCdnUserDomainsByFunc
DescribeCdnUserDomainsByFunc.summary: Queries accelerated domain names that have specified features configured and the status of the domain names.

DescribeCdnUserQuota.title: DescribeCdnUserQuota
DescribeCdnUserQuota.summary: Queries the quotas and usage of Alibaba Cloud CDN resources.

DescribeCdnUserResourcePackage.title: DescribeCdnUserResourcePackage
DescribeCdnUserResourcePackage.summary: Queries the resource plans that you have purchased for Alibaba Cloud CDN.

DescribeCdnWafDomain.title: DescribeCdnWafDomain
DescribeCdnWafDomain.summary: Queries domain names that use Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeCertificateInfoByID.title: DescribeCertificateInfoByID
DescribeCertificateInfoByID.summary: Queries the information about a specific certificate by certificate ID.

DescribeCustomLogConfig.title: DescribeCustomLogConfig
DescribeCustomLogConfig.summary: Queries the details about a custom logging configuration.

DescribeDomainAverageResponseTime.title: DescribeDomainAverageResponseTime
DescribeDomainAverageResponseTime.summary: Queries the average response time of one or more accelerated domain names. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainBpsData.title: DescribeDomainBpsData
DescribeDomainBpsData.summary: Queries bandwidth monitoring data for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainBpsDataByTimeStamp.title: DescribeDomainBpsDataByTimeStamp
DescribeDomainBpsDataByTimeStamp.summary: Queries the bandwidth data at a specified time for an accelerated domain.

DescribeDomainCcActivityLog.title: DescribeDomainCcActivityLog
DescribeDomainCcActivityLog.summary: Queries log entries of rate limiting.

DescribeDomainCertificateInfo.title: DescribeDomainCertificateInfo
DescribeDomainCertificateInfo.summary: Queries the certificate information of an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDomainCname.title: DescribeDomainCname
DescribeDomainCname.summary: Detects the CNAME for an accelerated domain name. You can check the resolution result to determine whether the CNAME is configured.

DescribeDomainCustomLogConfig.title: DescribeDomainCustomLogConfig
DescribeDomainCustomLogConfig.summary: Queries the custom log configuration of an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDomainDetailDataByLayer.title: DescribeDomainDetailDataByLayer
DescribeDomainDetailDataByLayer.summary: The domain name that you want to query. You can specify multiple domain names and separate them with commas (,). You can specify at most 30 domain names in each call.

DescribeDomainHitRateData.title: DescribeDomainHitRateData
DescribeDomainHitRateData.summary: Queries byte hit ratios that are measured in percentage.

DescribeDomainHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDomainHttpCodeData
DescribeDomainHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the total number and proportions of HTTP status codes returned from an accelerated domain name. The data is collected every 5 minutes.

DescribeDomainHttpCodeDataByLayer.title: DescribeDomainHttpCodeDataByLayer
DescribeDomainHttpCodeDataByLayer.summary: Queries HTTP status codes by protocol.

DescribeDomainISPData.title: DescribeDomainISPData
DescribeDomainISPData.summary: Queries the proportions of data usage of different Internet service providers (ISPs). Data is collected every day. You can query data collected in the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainMax95BpsData.title: DescribeDomainMax95BpsData
DescribeDomainMax95BpsData.summary: Queries the 95th percentile bandwidth data of a domain name.

DescribeDomainMultiUsageData.title: DescribeDomainMultiUsageData
DescribeDomainMultiUsageData.summary: Queries the traffic data and the number of requests for multiple accelerated domain names at a time.

DescribeDomainPathData.title: DescribeDomainPathData
DescribeDomainPathData.summary: Queries monitoring data including the amount of network traffic and the number of visits by directory.

DescribeDomainPvData.title: DescribeDomainPvData
DescribeDomainPvData.summary: Queries the page view (PV) data of an accelerated domain name. The data is collected at an interval of 1 hour. You can query data in the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainQpsData.title: DescribeDomainQpsData
DescribeDomainQpsData.summary: Queries the number of queries per second (QPS) for an accelerated domain name. The data is collected every 5 minutes. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainQpsDataByLayer.title: DescribeDomainQpsDataByLayer
DescribeDomainQpsDataByLayer.summary: Queries the number of queries per second (QPS) at a specific layer for one or more accelerated domain names. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainRealTimeBpsData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeBpsData
DescribeDomainRealTimeBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data about one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData
DescribeDomainRealTimeByteHitRateData.summary: Queries the byte hit ratios of accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainRealTimeDetailData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeDetailData
DescribeDomainRealTimeDetailData.summary: Queries the real-time monitoring data for a domain name.

DescribeDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData
DescribeDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the total number and proportions of HTTP status codes returned from an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDomainRealTimeQpsData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeQpsData
DescribeDomainRealTimeQpsData.summary: Queries the number of queries per second for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData
DescribeDomainRealTimeReqHitRateData.summary: Queries the request hit ratios for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcBpsData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcBpsData
DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcBpsData.summary: Queries origin bandwidth data for accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcHttpCodeData
DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the total number and proportions of HTTP status codes returned during back-to-origin routing.

DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcTrafficData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcTrafficData
DescribeDomainRealTimeSrcTrafficData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of back-to-origin traffic for one or more specified accelerated domains. The data is collected every minute.

DescribeDomainRealTimeTrafficData.title: DescribeDomainRealTimeTrafficData
DescribeDomainRealTimeTrafficData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of network traffic for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DescribeDomainRealtimeLogDelivery
DescribeDomainRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries the real-time log delivery information about an accelerated domain name.

DescribeDomainRegionData.title: DescribeDomainRegionData
DescribeDomainRegionData.summary: Queries the geographic distribution of users for a domain name. The data is collected at an interval of one day. You can query the data in the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainReqHitRateData.title: DescribeDomainReqHitRateData
DescribeDomainReqHitRateData.summary: Queries the request hit ratio in percentage.

DescribeDomainSrcBpsData.title: DescribeDomainSrcBpsData
DescribeDomainSrcBpsData.summary: Queries bandwidth monitoring data of requests that are redirected to origin servers for one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainSrcHttpCodeData.title: DescribeDomainSrcHttpCodeData
DescribeDomainSrcHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the proportions of HTTP status codes that are returned during back-to-origin routing.

DescribeDomainSrcQpsData.title: DescribeDomainSrcQpsData
DescribeDomainSrcQpsData.summary: Queries the number of queries per second (QPS) that are sent to the origin server. You can query data collected in the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainSrcTopUrlVisit.title: DescribeDomainSrcTopUrlVisit
DescribeDomainSrcTopUrlVisit.summary: Queries frequently requested origin URLs of one or more accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainSrcTrafficData.title: DescribeDomainSrcTrafficData
DescribeDomainSrcTrafficData.summary: Queries origin traffic for one or more specified accelerated domain names.

DescribeDomainTopClientIpVisit.title: DescribeDomainTopClientIpVisit
DescribeDomainTopClientIpVisit.summary: Queries client IP addresses that are ranked by the number of requests or the amount of network traffic within a specific time range for one or more accelerated domain names. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainTopReferVisit.title: DescribeDomainTopReferVisit
DescribeDomainTopReferVisit.summary: Queries frequently requested web pages of one or more accelerated domain names on a specified day and sorts the web pages. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainTopUrlVisit.title: DescribeDomainTopUrlVisit
DescribeDomainTopUrlVisit.summary: Queries top 100 frequently requested URLs of an accelerated domain name within a specified time range.

DescribeDomainTrafficData.title: DescribeDomainTrafficData
DescribeDomainTrafficData.summary: Queries network traffic for one or more accelerated domain names. You can query data that is collected in the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainUsageData.title: DescribeDomainUsageData
DescribeDomainUsageData.summary: Queries the resource usage data of specific domain names in a specified billable region.

DescribeDomainUvData.title: DescribeDomainUvData
DescribeDomainUvData.summary: Queries the unique visitor (UV) data of an accelerated domain name. Data is collected every hour. You can query data collected in the last 90 days.

DescribeDomainVerifyData.title: DescribeDomainVerifyData
DescribeDomainVerifyData.summary: Queries the verification content of an accelerated domain name based on whether the global resource plan is enabled.

DescribeDomainsBySource.title: DescribeDomainsBySource
DescribeDomainsBySource.summary: Queries accelerated domain names by origin server.

DescribeDomainsUsageByDay.title: DescribeDomainsUsageByDay
DescribeDomainsUsageByDay.summary: Queries the monitoring data of an accelerated domain name. Data is collected every day. You can query data collected within the last 90 days.

DescribeEsExceptionData.title: DescribeEsExceptionData
DescribeEsExceptionData.summary: Queries the execution errors of a script in EdgeScript (ES).

DescribeEsExecuteData.title: DescribeEsExecuteData
DescribeEsExecuteData.summary: Queries the execution status of scripts in EdgeScript (ES).

DescribeFCTrigger.title: DescribeFCTrigger
DescribeFCTrigger.summary: Queries a specified Function Compute trigger.

DescribeIpInfo.title: DescribeIpInfo
DescribeIpInfo.summary: Checks whether a specified IP address is the IP address of a CDN point of presence (POP).

DescribeIpStatus.title: DescribeIpStatus
DescribeIpStatus.summary: Queries the status of IP addresses of points of presence (POPs). The status of an IP address of a POP indicates whether content delivery acceleration is supported by the POP.

DescribeL2VipsByDomain.title: DescribeL2VipsByDomain
DescribeL2VipsByDomain.summary: Queries the virtual IP addresses (VIPs) of L2 CDN points of presence (POPs) for a specific domain name.

DescribePreloadDetailById.title: DescribePreloadDetailById
DescribePreloadDetailById.summary: Queries the prefetch details of a task, including the prefetch progress of all resources in the task. Only users who are included in the whitelist can use this operation. You can contact your business manager to apply for the whitelist.

DescribeRangeDataByLocateAndIspService.title: DescribeRangeDataByLocateAndIspService
DescribeRangeDataByLocateAndIspService.summary: Queries the bandwidth values by Internet service provider (ISP) and region.

DescribeRealtimeDeliveryAcc.title: DescribeRealtimeDeliveryAcc
DescribeRealtimeDeliveryAcc.summary: Queries the number of real-time log deliveries.

DescribeRefreshTaskById.title: DescribeRefreshTaskById
DescribeRefreshTaskById.summary: Queries the statuses of refresh or prefetch tasks by task ID.

DescribeRefreshTasks.title: DescribeRefreshTasks
DescribeRefreshTasks.summary: Queries the status of refresh or prefetch tasks that belong to an accelerated domain name.

DescribeStagingIp.title: DescribeStagingIp
DescribeStagingIp.summary: Queries node IP addresses in the staging environment.

DescribeTagResources.title: DescribeTagResources
DescribeTagResources.summary: Queries tags that are added to specified resources.

DescribeTopDomainsByFlow.title: DescribeTopDomainsByFlow
DescribeTopDomainsByFlow.summary: Queries the top N domain names ranked by network traffic. You can query data collected in the last 30 days.

DescribeUserCdnStatus.title: DescribeUserCdnStatus
DescribeUserCdnStatus.summary: Queries the status of a user.

DescribeUserCertificateExpireCount.title: DescribeUserCertificateExpireCount
DescribeUserCertificateExpireCount.summary: Queries the number of domain names whose SSL certificates are about to expire or have already expired.

DescribeUserDomains.title: DescribeUserDomains
DescribeUserDomains.summary: Queries all accelerated domain names in your Alibaba Cloud account and the status of the accelerated domain names. You can filter domain names by name or status. Fuzzy match is supported.

DescribeUserUsageDataExportTask.title: DescribeUserUsageDataExportTask
DescribeUserUsageDataExportTask.summary: Queries usage export tasks that were created in the last three months.

DescribeUserUsageDetailDataExportTask.title: DescribeUserUsageDetailDataExportTask
DescribeUserUsageDetailDataExportTask.summary: Queries tasks that were used to export resource usage details of one or more accelerated domain names that belong to your Alibaba Cloud account. Resource usage information is collected every five minutes.

DescribeUserVipsByDomain.title: DescribeUserVipsByDomain
DescribeUserVipsByDomain.summary: Queries virtual IP addresses (VIPs) of CDN points of presence (POPs) by domain name.

DescribeVerifyContent.title: DescribeVerifyContent
DescribeVerifyContent.summary: Queries the ownership verification content of an accelerated domain name.

DisableRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DisableRealtimeLogDelivery
DisableRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Disables real-time log delivery for specific accelerated domain names.

EnableRealtimeLogDelivery.title: EnableRealtimeLogDelivery
EnableRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Enables real-time log delivery for an accelerated domain name.

ListDomainsByLogConfigId.title: ListDomainsByLogConfigId
ListDomainsByLogConfigId.summary: Queries domain names by log configuration ID.

ListFCTrigger.title: ListFCTrigger
ListFCTrigger.summary: Queries the Function Compute trigger that is set for an Alibaba Cloud CDN event.

ListRealtimeLogDelivery.title: ListRealtimeLogDelivery
ListRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries all real-time log delivery tasks within your Alibaba Cloud account.

ListRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains.title: ListRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains
ListRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains.summary: Queries all domain names that are associated with a specific real-time log delivery configuration record.

ListRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos.title: ListRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos
ListRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos.summary: Queries the information about the real-time log delivery feature in a specified region.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are attached to a resource.

ListUserCustomLogConfig.title: ListUserCustomLogConfig
ListUserCustomLogConfig.summary: Queries all custom log configurations in your account.

ModifyCdnDomain.title: ModifyCdnDomain
ModifyCdnDomain.summary: Modifies the configuration of an accelerated domain name.

ModifyCdnDomainOwner.title: ModifyCdnDomainOwner
ModifyCdnDomainOwner.summary: Transfer domain names from an Alibaba Cloud account to the current account.

ModifyCdnDomainSchdmByProperty.title: ModifyCdnDomainSchdmByProperty
ModifyCdnDomainSchdmByProperty.summary: Changes the acceleration region for an accelerated domain name.

ModifyCdnService.title: ModifyCdnService
ModifyCdnService.summary: Changes the metering method of Alibaba Cloud CDN.

ModifyRealtimeLogDelivery.title: ModifyRealtimeLogDelivery
ModifyRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Modifies the configurations of real-time log delivery for a specific domain name. Each domain name supports only one Logstore.

OpenCdnService.title: OpenCdnService
OpenCdnService.summary: Activates Alibaba Cloud CDN. You must activate Alibaba Cloud CDN before you can manage domain names in Alibaba Cloud CDN.

PublishStagingConfigToProduction.title: PublishStagingConfigToProduction
PublishStagingConfigToProduction.summary: Publishes the configurations of the staging environment to the production environment.

PushObjectCache.title: PushObjectCache
PushObjectCache.summary: Prefetches content from origin servers to points of presence (POPs). This reduces loads on origin servers because users can directly hit cache upon their first visits.

RefreshObjectCacheByCacheTag.title: RefreshObjectCacheByCacheTag
RefreshObjectCacheByCacheTag.summary: Refreshes the cache based on cache tags that you configured.

RefreshObjectCaches.title: RefreshObjectCaches
RefreshObjectCaches.summary: Purges files on POPs. After files are purged, the original file content immediately becomes invalid. If clients request the original file content, Alibaba Cloud CDN redirects the requests to the origin server where the content is stored. Then, Alibaba Cloud CDN caches the latest content to the POPs and returns it to the clients. Alibaba Cloud CDN allows you to purge content from multiple URLs at a time.

RollbackStagingConfig.title: RollbackStagingConfig
RollbackStagingConfig.summary: Rolls back configurations in the staging environment. After you call this operation, all configurations in the staging environment are cleared.

SetCdnDomainCSRCertificate.title: SetCdnDomainCSRCertificate
SetCdnDomainCSRCertificate.summary: You can call this operation to configure an SSL certificate for a specific domain name.

SetCdnDomainSMCertificate.title: SetCdnDomainSMCertificate
SetCdnDomainSMCertificate.summary: Enables or disables a ShangMi (SM) certificate for a domain name.

SetCdnDomainSSLCertificate.title: SetCdnDomainSSLCertificate
SetCdnDomainSSLCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the certificate for a domain name and updates the certificate information.

SetCdnDomainStagingConfig.title: SetCdnDomainStagingConfig
SetCdnDomainStagingConfig.summary: Configures a domain name to be accelerated in the staging environment.

SetCdnFullDomainsBlockIP.title: SetCdnFullDomainsBlockIP
SetCdnFullDomainsBlockIP.summary: Blocks or unblocks IP addresses. This setting applies to all domain names in your account.

SetWaitingRoomConfig.title: SetWaitingRoomConfig
SetWaitingRoomConfig.summary: Configures the virtual waiting room feature for an accelerated domain name. This operation is available only for accelerated domain names of the Dynamic CDN workload type.

StartCdnDomain.title: StartCdnDomain
StartCdnDomain.summary: Enables a disabled domain name. After the domain name is enabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter is changed to Online.

StopCdnDomain.title: StopCdnDomain
StopCdnDomain.summary: Disables an accelerated domain name. After the domain name is disabled, the value of the DomainStatus parameter is changed to Offline.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds one or more tags to specific resources.

UpdateCdnSubTask.title: UpdateCdnSubTask
UpdateCdnSubTask.summary: Updates one or more operations reports.

UpdateFCTrigger.title: UpdateFCTrigger
UpdateFCTrigger.summary: Updates a specified Function Compute trigger.

VerifyDomainOwner.title: VerifyDomainOwner
VerifyDomainOwner.summary: Verifies the ownership of a specified domain name.
